languages.text: {n}Лицо Ирлиэт остается спокойным, почти безмятежным. Лишь руки плавно переплетаются меж собой, образуя новый замысловатый жест. Она все так же не слышит ваших слов — или предпочитает их игнорировать".{/n}

{n}Yrliet's face remains impassive, almost serene. The only movement comes from her hands, which intertwine smoothly, forming a new intricate gesture. She still does not hear your words — or is choosing to ignore them.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Ирлиэт остается спокойным, почти безмятежным. Лишь руки плавно переплетаются меж собой, образуя новый замысловатый жест. Она все так же не слышит ваших слов — или предпочитает их игнорировать".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's face remains impassive, almost serene. The only movement comes from her hands, which intertwine smoothly, forming a new intricate gesture. She still does not hear your words — or is choosing to ignore them.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Yrliet permanece impasible, casi sereno. El único movimiento procede de sus manos, que se entrelazan con suavidad formando un nuevo y elaborado gesto. Sigue sin oír tus palabras... o tal vez las esté ignorando deliberadamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face remains impassive, almost serene. The only movement comes from her hands, which intertwine smoothly, forming a new intricate gesture. She still does not hear your words — or is choosing to ignore them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Yrliet permanece impasible, casi sereno. El único movimiento procede de sus manos, que se entrelazan con suavidad formando un nuevo y elaborado gesto. Sigue sin oír tus palabras... o tal vez las esté ignorando deliberadamente.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの顔は無表情で、穏やかと言えるほどだ。唯一、彼女の手だけが滑らかに動き、見たことのない繊細な仕草を見せている。まだこちらの声が届いていないのか、あえて無視をしているのかもしれない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face remains impassive, almost serene. The only movement comes from her hands, which intertwine smoothly, forming a new intricate gesture. She still does not hear your words — or is choosing to ignore them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの顔は無表情で、穏やかと言えるほどだ。唯一、彼女の手だけが滑らかに動き、見たことのない繊細な仕草を見せている。まだこちらの声が届いていないのか、あえて無視をしているのかもしれない。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特仍然毫无表情，面容堪称安详，只有双手做着动作。她的双手流畅地交织在一起，做出了新的复杂手势。她依然没有听到你的话，或者只是选择性地忽略了它。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face remains impassive, almost serene. The only movement comes from her hands, which intertwine smoothly, forming a new intricate gesture. She still does not hear your words — or is choosing to ignore them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特仍然毫无表情，面容堪称安详，只有双手做着动作。她的双手流畅地交织在一起，做出了新的复杂手势。她依然没有听到你的话，或者只是选择性地忽略了它。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Yrliet reste impassible, presque serein. Son seul mouvement vient de ses mains qui s'entrelacent doucement pour former un nouveau geste complexe. Elle ne vous entend toujours pas... ou préfère vous ignorer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face remains impassive, almost serene. The only movement comes from her hands, which intertwine smoothly, forming a new intricate gesture. She still does not hear your words — or is choosing to ignore them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage d'Yrliet reste impassible, presque serein. Son seul mouvement vient de ses mains qui s'entrelacent doucement pour former un nouveau geste complexe. Elle ne vous entend toujours pas... ou préfère vous ignorer.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliets Gesicht bleibt teilnahmslos, fast friedlich. Nur ihre Hände bewegen sich, verflechten sich flüssig zu einer neuen komplizierten Geste. Sie hört deine Worte noch immer nicht — oder hat entschieden, sie zu ignorieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face remains impassive, almost serene. The only movement comes from her hands, which intertwine smoothly, forming a new intricate gesture. She still does not hear your words — or is choosing to ignore them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliets Gesicht bleibt teilnahmslos, fast friedlich. Nur ihre Hände bewegen sich, verflechten sich flüssig zu einer neuen komplizierten Geste. Sie hört deine Worte noch immer nicht — oder hat entschieden, sie zu ignorieren.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in neredeyse dinginlik hâkim olan yüzündeki kayıtsız ifade silinmiyor. Bedeninin hareket hâlindeki tek kısmı olan elleri, rahatça kenetlenerek yeni bir hareket meydana getiriyor. Söylediğin sözleri ya kulakları işitmiyor ya da duymazdan gelmeyi seçiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's face remains impassive, almost serene. The only movement comes from her hands, which intertwine smoothly, forming a new intricate gesture. She still does not hear your words — or is choosing to ignore them.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in neredeyse dinginlik hâkim olan yüzündeki kayıtsız ifade silinmiyor. Bedeninin hareket hâlindeki tek kısmı olan elleri, rahatça kenetlenerek yeni bir el hareketi oluşturuyor. Söylediğin sözleri ya kulakları işitmiyor ya da duymazdan gelmeyi seçiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
